entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:41PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Clay, Archer and Baylor Counties through 930 PM CDT... At 841 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 4 miles east of Bellevue to near Windthorst to near Archer City to 5 miles west of Lake Kickapoo to 5 miles southwest of Lake Kemp. Movement was southeast at 20 mph.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:25PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Montague and southwestern Cooke Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 825 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Muenster to near Henrietta. Movement was south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 8:14PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wise, northern Denton, southern Cooke and southwestern Grayson Counties through 900 PM CDT...
